content: i am thrilled to announce my cal something magic to you which will start on monday 23rd july 2018 the pattern will be available in english us terms danish swedisch dutch and hebrew the cal will be hosted by the cal- crochet a long group on facebook https //www facebook com/groups/668646249929007/ you can find all further info you need and the story behind my blanket in the introducing pdf i hope you re all going to join me in this magical journey happy hooking please join my ravelry group https //www ravelry com/groups/something-magic-cal-2018 there is also a pdf for download here with the amounts of yarn per round if you are using yarn from your stash how i blocked my blanket i spread it out on my carpet and gently pushed it outwards to flatten and straighten it with my hands pinned it at part 2 the points of the star after part 8 and at the edges if you do not have the room to do it all in one time you can fold it in half and do each part separate it is your choice to either spray it with water and let it completely dry or like me to blow it with a hairdryer and let it completely cool down acrylic only needs heath you can find all about blocking here https //crystalsandcrochet com/crochet/blocking/ thank you all for joining this magical journey and if you want to see more of me than come visit my crochet page https //www facebook com/something-crochet-1875698805791418/
